Title: Monarch Water Ultimate Ultra HE twin tank duplex series dual power water softener
Description: Supplying twice the contact time for even softer water, the Monarch Water Ultra HE water softener is built with a twin tank duplex Sof'N'Polish system. Using unique resin beads with a large surface area and tablet or block salt, this softener offers a greater capacity per regeneration compared to other resin systems, with Opti-Brining technology reducing waste by regenerating only used resin. For extra efficiency, the Ultra HE has a Customer Protect Programme (CPP) that not only learns and acts on usage patterns to save water and salt, automatically adjusting to BST/GMT time changes, but that also detects leaks, allowing for fast repair action to be taken. Fitting to 15mm or 22mm systems and suitable for combi boilers or pressurised unvented systems, the Ultra HE comes with an installation kit including a Hi-flow Rapid-Fit bypass meaning up to 80% fewer installation components are needed.
category: Heating/Water Treatment Products/Water Softener Systems/Water Softener Systems.csv -> Monarch Water Ultimate Ultra HE twin tank duplex series dual power water softener

Title: Center CB water softener salt tablets bag 25kg
Description: Bring domestic and small commercial water softeners back to life with Center CB Aquasol water softener salt tablets, formulated to efficiently soften water while treating hard water. Supplied in a 25kg bag, these tablets offer numerous benefits, including the prevention of limescale, which can help your clients to save money on maintenance and extend the life of appliances, showers and hot water and heating systems. Pure and high-quality, these pillow-shaped briquettes are compressed from fine salt and have been designed to minimise breakage and chipping while fully dissolving with no bridging in the salt reservoir.
category: Heating/Water Treatment Products/Water Softener Systems/Water Softener Systems.csv -> Center CB water softener salt tablets bag 25kg
